product_name: Lonely Planet Guides The Kindness of Strangers: Tales of Fate and Fortune On the Road
long_description: This collection of 26 inspiring tales explores the unexpected human connections that transform the experience of travel. Editor: Don George. Softcover; 271 pages. Lonely Planet Publications; copyright 2008. Features original stories from Jan Morris, Tim Cahill, Simon Winchester and Dave Eggers.
short_description: This collection of 26 inspiring tales explores the unexpected human connections that transform the experience of travel.
